title: Marks vs Rank.
content:
Can anyone of you give me a rough estimate of marks vs rank of PESSAT ? 
How much should I target out of 180 to get 600 rank ?

comments.body:
Can vary a lot based on shift and year.
My best guess for my shift back in 2021 would be around 115 for 600 rank
Okayy
I hereby declare the plethora of posts regarding college selection , branch selection , rank , OPEN
They don't give you your marks, just your rank (at least that's how it was when I wrote PESSAT). So there's no way of knowing.
Vapis bol bhai
Around 120 would be a safe score for under 600 rank
Great and how is the paper ?COMEDK level ?
It's very easy you can compare that to comedk level
It depends on your shift, I'd say. When I wrote PESSAT the questions in my shift were very easy, barely comedk level.
120 for 600 rank in Easy shift ?(you said your shift was easy )
Any idea on how many marks I should target to get a rank of around 600?

I cannot say for sure because they don't release your marks, just the rank. I think there were 180 questions and I answered all of them because there was no negative marking. At least 30 of them would have been mere guesses. Btw I'm not even sure their ranking scheme is legit, I know a complete idiot that had a rank of 400 and a very smart person with 15k. 

If you want CSE in RR campus you'll need rank 1200 or less.

I hope this isn't a scam like VIT ðŸ¤¡
Can I DM you ?
Yeah
There is no official release of cut off or marks vs rank. However, score good marks180 out of 600 is a low score.
It's over i got 8k rank
with 180 marks?

the max obtainable marks is 180

op asked how much out of 180 lol
yes. I read it wrong.
result is out tough
